snippet: The Arkansas House failed Tuesday to renew the state’s compromise Medicaid expansion plan, leaving in limbo a program heralded as a model for Republican-leaning states to implement the federal health overhaul.
abstract: Arkansas House fails to renew state’s compromise Medicaid expansion plan, leaving in limbo program heralded as model for Republican-leaning states to implement federal health overhaul.
lead_paragraph: The Arkansas House failed Tuesday to renew the state’s compromise Medicaid expansion plan, leaving in limbo a program heralded as a model for Republican-leaning states to implement the federal health overhaul.

headline.main: Arkansas: Compromise on Medicaid Is Held Up
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Compromise on Medicaid Is Held Up
